item.title: Salsa steps
item.description: Salsa steps # If you always wanted to start learning Salsa and never really had the time to do so: Today a new beginners’ course starts at Salsa Con Corazon in Berlin Sch√∂neberg. The course is still open for registration teaching the very basics in four sessions - one per week.
